metadata.name: The Lotus Flower
metadata.description:
The Lotus Flower is an ancient symbol of purity, rebirth, and enlightenment. As it emerges from the muddy waters, the lotus flower remains untouched and unstained, symbolizing the power of the human spirit to rise above adversity and attain spiritual growth.

By minting this Lotus Flower NFT, you will become an integral part of the Spare Souls journey, allowing you to unlock its future potential and purpose.
